content:
This PR adds one file to define equal/mixed characteristic zero and add the basic API. As it is self-contained and does not much interact with other parts of the mathlib yet, this should be relatively straight-forward to review.
It is a bit longer (450 lines) but as it provides new defs + API I am not sure if it makes sense to split it up...

All other changed files in the PR are from the dependencies ( #15101 and #14897) and simply shorten some proofs.

Thanks!
